data.text: And this is the blessing with which Moses the man of God blessed the children of Israel before his death.
And he said,
And he spared his people,
The law which Moses charged us,
And he shall be prince with the beloved one,
Let Reuben live, and not die;
And this is the blessing of Judah;
And to Levi he said,
Who says to his father and mother, I have not seen thee;
They shall declare thine ordinances to Jacob,
Bless, Lord, his strength,
And to Benjamin he said,
And to Joseph he said,
And of the fruits of the changes of the sun in season,
From the top of the ancient mountains,
And of the fullness of the land in season:
His beauty is as the firstling of his bull,
And to Zebulun he said,
They shall utterly destroy the nations, and ye shall call men there,
And to Gad he said,
And he saw his firstfruits,
And to Dan he said,
And to Naphtali he said,
And to Asher he said,
His sandal shall be iron and brass;
There is not any such as the God of the beloved;
And the rule of God shall protect thee,
And Israel shall dwell in confidence
Blessed art thou, O Israel;
